name: Saigon - The Unseen city
description: Are you looking for more than an average vacation? Do you love to explore and want to see the “real” Saigon? Then our tour is where you want to be!  Saigon- The Unseen City tour is designed for those who are tired of the usual bland bus tours, and are looking for an adventurous trip to see parts of Saigon many tourists will never see or experience. Throughout the tight alleyways, colorful markets, mysterious ancient temples, and enjoying the appetizing local cuisine, we will make sure you will have an unforgettable experience in this vibrant and astounding city.
